ISSUE.TITLE: Can not install plugins with MigrationProcessType.NoMatter migration
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: We get **Cannot insert duplicate key row in object 'dbo.MigrationVersionInfo' with unique index 'UC_Version'** error when we try to make a clean installation of any of plugins that have MigrationProcessType.NoMatter migrations type [see ditails here](https://www.nopcommerce.com/en/boards/topic/95677/nopcommerce-460-bug-fixes-and-improvements#302814)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6528 Fixed installing plugins with MigrationProcessType.NoMatter migration
